name: Drone X Augmented Reality Game
description:
• Shoot killer drones in real-world Augmented Reality, immerse yourself into the battleground and save the core!!

• Select between normal & hard modes. Prove either you're a cat or a lion :)

• The shield will protect you from enemy fire temporarily. Avail that time & kill as many as you can to win.

• Special guns are unlocked once your shield is turned on. You can toggle through special guns at every shield enabling event.

• More enemies will be added soon.

• Playable on any android device that supports ARCore.

• Your support will bring a lot to this game. Send you suggestions and emails to hello@vivecreative.net

How To Play

• Open the app & enter your name. Select the difficulty level you're comfortable at. Select the level.

• As soon as you click on the place core button. You will see your core being attacked by the enemy drones. You should kill them before they destroy the core!!
